title: "Japanese tanker firms invest in Finnish AI navigation startup"
excerpt: "Three Japanese domestic tanker operators have invested in a Finnish smart navigation firm. Groke Technologies was established in October 2019 to develop autonomous-related navigation solutions. It has since gained the backing of Japanese bluechip Mitsubishi Corporation."
